Text: i bought the zen xtra 30g as a gift .  what a disappointment .  the software failed repeatedly .  i could n't load more than one song before the software crashed .  creative labs customer support website is useless .  software downloads on the site crashed my pc .  creative tech support operators work 9-6 p.m. weekdays - as if i had time during work hours to spend time on this .  do n't buy this thing .
